input.sentences: grampa 's train setup created a tiny world | with all kinds of details | like little schools .
i could watch the trains rush by for hours .
i 'd stand by the tracks and pretend i lived in the little world .
i 'd be right there on the fair ride with the teensy kids .
i wish i could go to that land right now .
output.sentences: Little Jimmy is enjoying the bus going around the neighborhood.
Then he sees the trains going to the train station.
He follows the train all the way to the train station.
After that, he wanders off to ride the swings.
While, the rain keeps on running around the track.
